00046 /* Frame initialisation */
00047 TBVFrame::TBVFrame(wxFrame *frame, const wxString& title,wxPoint pos, wxSize size)
00048                         : wxFrame(frame, -1, title,pos,size)
00049 {
00050     // Loading icon
00051         // wxIcon icon(sirs_xpm);
00052     //SetIcon(icon);
00053         
00054     // adding status bar
00055         CreateStatusBar(2,0,ID_STATUS);
00056         
00057         // dessin de l'interface
00058         wxPanel * top_panel = new wxPanel (this, -1,wxDefaultPosition,wxDefaultSize );
00059         INTERFACE(top_panel, FALSE);
00060         
00061         // create the menu
00062         SetMenuBar(MENU());
00063         
00064         
00065         // define as log window
00066         wxLog::SetActiveTarget (new wxLogTextCtrl ((wxTextCtrl *) FindWindowById(ID_LOG,this)));
00067         
00068         // programm started
00069         wxLogMessage(_("Program started"));
00070         
00071         // get the client version
00072         SetStatusText(_("MySQL embedded version : ") + myDatabase.DatabaseGetVersion(),1);
00073         
00074         
00075         // getting the tree ctrl
00076         pTreeCtrl = (wxTreeCtrl *) FindWindowById(ID_LISTTABLE,this);
00077         
00078         // Creating the gridoperation object
00079         pGridOp = new GridOperation((wxGrid *) FindWindowById(ID_GRID,this));
00080 
00081         
00082 }

00090 void TBVFrame::OnOpenDatabase(wxCommandEvent & event)
00091 {
00092         wxArrayString myStringArray;
00093         
00094         if(myDatabase.DataBaseOpen(_("/Users/Lucien/DATA/PRJ/TOOLMAP/TestBDD/BDD/data/")))
00095         {
00096                 wxLogMessage(_("Database opened"));
00097                                 
00098                 myStringArray = myDatabase.DataBaseListTables();
00099                 
00100                 // add database name
00101                 TreeAddItem(_("i4418575"),0);
00102                 
00103                 // add tables names
00104                 for (int i=0; i<myStringArray.Count(); i++) 
00105                 {
00106                         TreeAddItem(myStringArray.Item(i),1);
00107                 }
00108                 
00109         }
00110         else
00111         {
00112                 wxLogError(_("Error opening the database"));
00113         }
00114         
00115 
00116 }

00119 void TBVFrame::OnQuit(wxCloseEvent & event)
00120 {
00121                 // if the database is opened, we close the database.
00122                 if (myDatabase.DataBaseIsOpen()) 
00123                 {
00124                         myDatabase.DataBaseClose();
00125                 }
00126                 
00127                 this->Destroy();
00128 
00129 }

00132 void TBVFrame::OnProcessRequest (wxCommandEvent & event)
00133 {
00134         if (myDatabase.DataBaseIsOpen()) 
00135         {
00136                         
00137                 // create and display the SQLPROCESS dialog box.
00138                 SQLPROCESS_DLG_OP * myDlg = new SQLPROCESS_DLG_OP(this,
00139                                                                                                                   -1, _("Process SQL User Request"),
00140                                                                                                                   wxDefaultPosition,wxDefaultSize,
00141                                                                                                                   wxDEFAULT_DIALOG_STYLE        | wxRESIZE_BORDER);
00142                 
00143                 myDlg->SetDataBase(&myDatabase);                                                                                                        
00144                 myDlg->SetMinSize(wxSize(300,200));
00145                 myDlg->CentreOnParent();
00146                 myDlg->ShowModal();     
00147         }
00148         else
00149         {
00150                 wxLogError(_("No Database opened, please open a database first"));
00151         }
00152         
00153 }

00156 void TBVFrame::TreeAddItem (wxString tname, int parent)
00157 {
00158         if (parent == 0) 
00159         {
00160                 pTreeCtrl->AddRoot (tname); 
00161         }
00162         else 
00163                 pTreeCtrl->AppendItem(pTreeCtrl->GetRootItem(),tname);  
00164 }

00168 void TBVFrame::OnDoubleClickListe (wxTreeEvent & event)
00169 {
00170         wxArrayString myFieldArray;
00171         int i; // loop
00172         
00173         wxTreeItemId myItemID = event.GetItem();
00174         // get the table name
00175         wxString myTempString = pTreeCtrl->GetItemText(myItemID);
00176         myFieldArray = myDatabase.DatabaseListFields(myTempString);
00177         
00178         // check for field numbers (may be not a table)
00179         if (myFieldArray.Count() > 0)
00180         {
00181                 // debug message...
00182                 wxLogMessage(_("%d fields readed from the table '%s'"),
00183                                          myFieldArray.Count(),myTempString.c_str());
00184                 
00185                 // change the number of cols
00186                 pGridOp->GridOpSetNumberOfColumn(myFieldArray.Count());
00187                 
00188                 for (i = 0; i<myFieldArray.Count(); i++) 
00189                 {
00190                         pGridOp->GridOpChangeColumnText(myFieldArray.Item(i),i,TRUE);
00191                 }
00192                 
00193                 // get the data....
00194                 if(myDatabase.DataBaseGetAllTableContent(myTempString))
00195                 {
00196                         wxLogMessage(_("Reading table '%s' OK"),myTempString.c_str());
00197                         
00198                         int iArrayCount = 0;
00199                         
00200                         while (1) 
00201                         {
00202                                 myFieldArray = myDatabase.DataBaseGetNextResult();
00203                                 iArrayCount = myFieldArray.Count();
00204                                 if (iArrayCount == 0) 
00205                                 {
00206                                         break;
00207                                 }
00208                                 
00209                                 // add a new line
00210                                 pGridOp->GridOpAddDataRow(iArrayCount,
00211                                                                                   &myFieldArray);
00212                         }
00213                 
00214                 }
00215                 else 
00216                 {
00217                         wxLogError(_("Error reading the table '%s'"),myTempString.c_str());
00218                 }
00219 
00220                 
00221                 
00222         }
00223         
00224 }
